item.description:
PARDON the short notice . . . it is a sieve to separate the hasty elite from those worthless sods who plan in advance. So! Writers shall be convening for our weekly workshop at 7:30 PM this evening, at Espresso Royale Caf√©, 736 Commonwealth Avenue. On the Docket:

1. Short story by Tom Simmons. If you would like to read the work in advance, e-mail me and I shall send it to you.

2. Poem by yours truly. One wonders if the workshop queue is a fair one . . .

3. Journal business: review of status to date for August issue, Print Issue No. 2.
item.name: June 1st Workshop
